text: Momin to asal mein wahi hain jo Allah aur uske Rasool ko dilse maane aur jab kisi ijtimaii kaam ke mauqe par Rasool ke saath hon to ussey ijazat liye bagair na jayein, Jo log tumse ijazat maangte hain wahi Allah aur Rasool ke maannay walay hain. Pas jab woh apne kisi kaam se ijazat maangein to jisey tum chaho ijazat de diya karo aur aise logon ke haqq mein Allah se dua e magfirat kiya karo. Allah yaqeenan gafoor o raheem hai
